meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat high blood pressure and prevent heart attacks.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed propranolols to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of propranolols, so I had to wait for the next shipment.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook my propranolols for candy and almost ate them!
meanings.sent4: Taking propranolols is like having a tiny superhero protecting your heart.
meanings.sent5: The propranolols worked like magic, keeping my heart healthy and strong.

meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed two propranolols a day for my condition.
meanings.sent2: I need to remember to pick up more propranolols from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the bottle of propranolols all over the floor!
meanings.sent4: The propranolols on the shelf looked like a tiny army ready to fight illness.
meanings.sent5: The propranolols in the container rattled softly as I shook it, reminding me to take my dose.
